statements: DELETE FROM global_education_trends WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2021;

DELETE FROM global_education_trends WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2020;

DELETE FROM initiatives WHERE end_year < 2010 AND description LIKE '%innovation%';
